item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 24, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. AWS data center latencies, visualized (211 points | 83 comments)
2. Rocket Lab Begins Installation of Large Carbon Composite Rocket-Building Machine (4 points | discuss)
3. Show HN: Wall-mounted diffusion mirror that turns reflections into paintings (304 points | 67 comments)
4. Show HN: Microsoft Teams Ticketing System – Ticketing as a Service (11 points | 6 comments)
5. Show HN: RF Hunter – Find hidden cameras and other devices (155 points | 51 comments)
6. A field guide to the central, creeping section of the San Andreas Fault (2006) (3 points | discuss)
7. Pretty.c (121 points | 59 comments)
8. Playstation Vita Architecture (Part 1) (189 points | 60 comments)
9. NetGuard – rootless Android outbound per-app OSS firewall, like LittleSnitch (98 points | 53 comments)
10. What happens when you make a move in lichess.org? (258 points | 112 comments)
11. How do merging supermassive black holes pass the final parsec? (42 points | 38 comments)
12. Show HN: Open-source low-code email editor (107 points | 19 comments)
13. Ask HN: Website with 6^16 subpages and 80k+ daily bots (74 points | 69 comments)
14. Fearless SSH: Short-lived certificates bring Zero Trust to infrastructure (107 points | 86 comments)
15. Probably pay attention to tokenizers (232 points | 70 comments)
16. My NumPy year: Creating a DType for the next generation of scientific computing (59 points | 4 comments)
17. The Anvil Text Editor (3 points | discuss)
18. Launch HN: GPT Driver (YC S21) – End-to-end app testing in natural language (100 points | 76 comments)
19. A DSL for peephole transformation rules of integer operations in the PyPy JIT (93 points | 8 comments)
20. Reinforcement Learning: An Introduction (2018) (82 points | 16 comments)
21. Implementing attributes for plain text using subranges like Emacs (9 points | discuss)
22. Irreproducible Results (2011) (37 points | 17 comments)
23. The Tragedy of Google Books (2017) (413 points | 162 comments)
24. Postbox has been acquired by eM Client (64 points | 24 comments)
25. Parks on the Air (92 points | 49 comments)
26. GPT-based translator for large pptx files (9 points | discuss)
27. Show HN: I built a task manager that separates "do" and "due" dates (121 points | 58 comments)
28. Seeing faces in things: A model and dataset for pareidolia (52 points | 7 comments)
29. Netflix Shuts Down Its AAA Game Studio (9 points | 1 comment)
30. OOP is not that bad (99 points | 188 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 24, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
